name: 2022 IEEE 4th International Conference on Circuits and Systems (IEEE ICCS 2022)
content: 1.Conference Proceedings Accepted and presented papers will be published by ICCS conference proceedings, which will be online and indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus. 2.SCI/EI Journals Selected excellent papers after extension will be recommended to the following: >> Journal of Systems Architecture: Embedded Software Design (ISSN: 1383-7621) CCF B Indexing: SCI, Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. >> Journal of Circuits, Systems and Computers (ISSN: 0218-1266) Indexing: SCIE, Ei Compendex, SCOPUS, etc. >> Journal of Electronic Science and Technology (ISSN 1674-862X) Indexing: Scopus, INSPEC, CSCD, DOAJ etc., OA on ScienceDirect.
